current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Transportation
		  to ensure that on-duty time does not include waiting time at a natural gas or
		  oil well site for certain commercial motor vehicle operators, and for other
		  purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Commerce, Science, and
			 Transportation

short-title.#text:
Preserving Jobs in the Oilfield Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

term.#tail:
means the operator of a commercial motor
			 vehicle transporting supplies, equipment, or materials (including produced
			 fluids, drilling and completion fluids, and any other fluids or materials used
			 in the drilling, completion, and production of an oil or gas well) to or from a
			 natural gas or oil well site.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall
			 ensure that the exception described in

external-xref.#tail:
of title 49, Code of
			 Federal Regulations (relating to on-duty time not including waiting time at a
			 natural gas or oil well site) applies to covered operators regardless of
			 whether the operators have received special training or operate vehicles
			 specially constructed to service wells.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1380 IS: Preserving Jobs in the Oilfield Act of 2013

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
